title: Melia Winegar’s CV
text:
Data Scientist, Accountant, BYU-Idaho Student.

win23023@byui.edu | My LinkedIn page



Soft Skills:

Proficient Organization Skills
Outgoing Person
Attention to Detail
Critical Thinking
Teamwork

Hard Skills:

Intermediate Excel Skills
Customer Service
Beginning Python Programming
Beginning Data Analysis Skills
Public Speaking




Graduated May 2020 Wasatch High School, Heber City, UT
Aug 2020 - May 2021, Jan 2023 - May 2023 Utah Valley University, Orem, UT
Sep 2023 - Current Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, ID
CURRENTLY PURSING: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting


Jul 2021 - Dec 2022 Missionary, Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints, Richmond, VA

Worked as a Training Leader and led 20+ missionaries for three months
Was asked to be a brand-new missionary trainer for over 10 months of my 18 month mission
Was called into technology leadership positions for almost 6 months of my missionary experience
Undertook being a companion, living, and consistently working with multiple disabled and struggling missionaries. Volunteer hours were 80+ hours a week

Aug 2023 - Feb 2024 Logistics Supervisor, Disciple Leadership Committe (BYU - Idaho), Rexburg, ID

Problem solved and event planned at a proficcient level
Organized and planned the Disciple Leadership Conference with over 500+ attendees
Worked with 10 others to plan and prepare to strengthen the spirituality of all attendees

Aug 2013 - May 2020 Club Member and President, Governing Youth Council, Heber City, UT

Was a club member for 5 years and served as the president of the Council for 1 year
Worked with multiple students, teachers, and leaders to warn parents and students about the danger of drugs and alcohol to students.
Gained skills in public speaking, advertisement, and public awareness





Feb 2024 - Present Assisstant Bookkeeper, Winegar Real Estate Group LLC, Heber City, UT

Developing skills in reconciling bank statements
Pursuing proficiency in bookkeeping utilizing QuickBooks software
Gaining expertise in invoicing processes and managing Accounts Receivable

July 2023 - Aug 2023 Assembly Line Employee, MIRO Industries, Heber City, UT

Top worker in production lines
Adopted and thoroughly applied Lean principles to the work environment
Showed principles of grit and hard work as I assembled rooftop support products

Aug 2019 - Apr 2020 Hostess/Busser/Food Runer Cashier, Zermatt Hotel Restaurants, Midway, UT

Managed to-go orders as a hostesss
Managed and supervised the hosting station
Occasionally served as a food runner as well and waited tables when needed

Jun 2018 - Aug 2018 Server/Barista/Cashier, Hokulia Shaved Ice, Heber City, UT

Maintained a clean work environment
Provided many forms of customer service
Consistently and independentaly performed closing and opening duties
